featured.text: Although the term did not emerge until the 18th century, toy hoops twirled around the waist, limbs, or neck can be traced back to ancient times.

definition.zh_def: 旋轉，轉動，快速地轉動或旋轉。
definition.en_def: To spin or rotate rapidly around a central point.
definition.example: She loves to twirl in her new dress.
